channel.title: Private servers on the runescape forums
channel.description:
Alright...so i've been just going around the forums and someone brings up a subject about moparscape, so I click it and then the first post read 'DO NOT NAME THEM, that is a illegal game stolen from runescapes office and you will go to jail for using one', so I reply with a message saying it isn't intirely illegal, and them a mod locks it and says that I'm stepping out of bounds and crap and that I don't need to "make up lies to make it seem alright"
An few minutes later I pm the mod that locked to topic saying that he was wrong an shit, then he threatened to ban me for 'knowing of illegal clients' I want to know what fucking hole some people on that game crawled out of and why they are even forum mods.

[/quote]

All we use is the client. winterLove was the first person to write the first server, we basically “added” to it.[/quote]

I vet winterlove could make a better client than jagex tbh… if he did then there would be NO copyright issues.

item.title: Private servers on the runescape forums
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“Mod Adam, post:6, topic:90733”]That’s just a noob seeing a Private Server but thinking that it is a Jagex Owned server.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 06:06:50 PM[/size][hr][quote author=regecks` link=topic=132394.msg1283126#msg1283126 date=1178596233]

[quote author=Mod Adam link=topic=132394.msg1282388#msg1282388 date=1178583381]
It’s not copyright infringement with proper credits…
[/quote]You are violating their intellectual property, it’s still infringement even if you say the client was “originally” made by Jagex.[/quote]

Their intellectual property that they release to the public. Couldn’t they just make it so the RuneScape files wouldn’t go to your computer? I know this would piss off many people because they’d constantly have to download the files, but it would put communities like this to a hault.

Im not suggesting this… lol Just a meer question and reply to what regecks’ said.[/quote]

They could do that, but then they wouldn’t have any players, since we’d all have to walk to Jagexs office to play the game.

EDIT: Also, they don’t release their intellectual property to the public, that would be putting their source code in the public domain. They let us use it, but they still retain the copyright.

Read full topic
item.source: Private servers on the runescape forums

item.title: Private servers on the runescape forums
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

[quote=“Brad_c, post:4, topic:90733”]“For knowing of ilegal clients”

Ok, I know about lighting fires, should i be arrested for arson

I know a lot about guns, and am a proficent shooter, should i be arrested for handling a weapon?

I know where to shoot someone to kill them instantly, should i be arrested for murder?

I know how to steal stuff, but once again, should i be arrested, no.[/quote]
QFT, but it is sort of suspicious to Jagex if someone comes on blabbing a ton of shit about private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Private servers on the runescape forums
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

“Isn’t entirely illegal”?

Stealing Jagexs client and putting it on your site IS illegal, no doubt about it. Have you seen how much they charge for people like miniclip to do that? Nevermind the fact we edit them Some forums aren’t as friendly with copyright infringement as this one, i guess that’s up to them.

Read full topic

An few minutes later I pm the mod that locked to topic saying that he was wrong an shit, then he threatened to ban me for ‘knowing of illegal clients’
